about_the_game:
Do the wild lands of Kainga call to you but you're not sure if it's your type of game?

Why not try this DEMO!



Descend from the Skyloft as a Thinker, a leader of a village, to guide your followers to complete 30-60 minute challenges. Settle your people, choose technologies that will protect them from weather events, the environment, wildlife and neighboring tribes! Earn Karma to unlock new complexity, and complete quests to unlock new maps and Thinkers.

The demo includes:

  • 3 unusual maps to explore (1 to unlock)
  • 2 Thinkers to master (1 to unlock)
  • 69 technologies to experiment with

Your save progress from the demo will carry over to the main game when you get it!



Kainga will subvert your expectations on what a game in the "city-builder" genre can be by greatly altering traditional gameplay and adopting certain influences from a number of games including some "roguelite" elements:
  • Instead of long, drawn-out games, Kainga is based around shorter challenges
  • Choose from unique technologies keeping each run fresh
  • There is no saving or loading, only trying again
  • No mood, hunger or temperature management or even stockpiles
  • Make progress between runs by unlocking new technology options



Try out Kainga for yourself!
Keep an open mind and let yourself find new strategies and playstyles with each successive run!

name: Kainga Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU, Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.0 support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Have Fun!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: The more the merrier
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.0 support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Have lots of fun!

short_description: Establish unusual towns adapted to their surroundings in this roguelite village-builder. Guide your Thinker to find the technology needed to survive, thrive and complete short challenges. Test your skills and explore the wild lands in this Demo.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
